parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Object Manipulation

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Returns the direction an object or a location is facing (differs from [[getDir]] in that this also works with locations).

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> '''direction''' object

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> object: [[Object]] or [[Location]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Number]] -  
Direction in degrees, range 0 to 360
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[player]] [[setDir]] 90;
_d = [[direction]] [[player]];//returns 90</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[getDir]], [[getDirVisual]], [[setDir]], [[setDirection]]
</value></part></template>



[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.99|DIRECTION]]
[[Category:Scripting Commands OFP 1.96|DIRECTION]]
